author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
Working like a prototype should: letting them know what is and isn’t working so they can make modifications and adjustments.
The reporter seems to be practicing for a job at one of the tabloids.

author: Willy
content: As many others have found in time. What works at one scale doesnt mean it will work when one increases the size.

author: Peter Wright
content: A great idea that like so many will start with setbacks. But these guys will crack it.
